name: Uptime, SEO and Security monitors – UptimeZone
author: Chatra

sections.description:
UptimeZone is an all-in-one website monitoring tool

✅ Uptime monitors
✅ SEO monitors
✅ Vulnerability monitors
✅ Blacklist monitors

  • ** Get alerted whenever downtime happens to your website.
  • ** Receive notifications of any SEO or security issues.

Free forever plan, or $9 per month

For the full feature list and additional information check https://uptimezone.com

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
• Install and activate the UptimeZone Plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  • After installation, click the Settings → UptimeZone section in the left toolbar
  • Create a new free UptimeZone account, or use your existing one. Log in into https://uptimezone.com in another browser tab and copy the widget code from “Your profile” section.
  • Go back to WordPress console, paste the code and press Save changes
  • Go back to UptimeZone dashboard and create your new monitors
  • Done!

For the full feature list and additional information check https://uptimezone.com

Arbitrary section

screenshots.caption: Monitor your website or IP host from multiple locations. HTTP(S), ping, port, and keywords checks available

SEO & Blacklist monitors. Monitor your website for multiple SEO mistakes on autopilot. Hundreds of regular checks to keep your website SEO-healthy. Monitor your website or IP for showing up on major blacklists. Get alerts when you get blacklisted so you can take immediate action
Vulnerability monitors. We regularly scan your website for different vulnerabilities and identify issues before they become a problem.
Get alerted about any failures in real-time.
